channel.title: Help with damage
channel.description: Alright, well I'm slowly fixing my maxes in my server. But, that's only applying for melee attacks. How can I change the 'damage' for mage attacks/range attacks. To help make them more legit. I fixed the melee hits to legit, I just can't find where to fix the mage/range :l.

item.title: Help with damage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Guys, what should I search to find it? So I can fix these hits. Can anyone give me a specific key word.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 10:43:12 am[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic

@noobie22 wrote:

Uhm. Search the rune ID’s(555,565,560). You should search them because you need the runes to activate the spell. If that doesn’t work, try clickingMost class.

item.title: Help with damage
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Rickpwns, post:9, topic:272826”]Oh, wait. Here is the code for Darkbow.

if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
setAnimation(426);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(45);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156
I would change the highlighted number into smaller numbers for smaller hits, correct?[/quote]
No. 15156 is your item ID for the Dark Bow.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with damage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

I believe you can put it at the end of the code, as long as it’s still part of the string.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 08:58:35 am[/size][hr][quote=“pure ess ftw, post:10, topic:272826”]the 1.95 is right under the code, the code for a simple weapon would be like
if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))
{
d *= 1.95D;
} else
This being a rune c’bow i beleive(or rune bolts can’t remember) o.o you switch the 1.95
the dbow is under that * or should be * and arrows and things is above!!![/quote]
Their is no 1.95. Read the thing that I posted before you. Tell me if I’m correct.

Read full topic
